ul_213054: sudo ip netns exec "$netns" socat abstract-listen:test-ns,fork /dev/null &
ps -eopid= |
  while read p; do
    nsenter -n"/proc/$p/ns/net" socat -u abstract:test-ns - 2> /dev/null &&
      echo "$p"
  done

Explanations about Options.-u:
Only match processes whose effective user ID is listed. Either the numerical or
 symbolical value may be used.
Explanations about Options.-P: Only match processes whose parent process ID is listed.
Explanations about Options.-c:
Suppress normal output; instead print a count of matching processes. When count
 does not match anything, e.g. returns zero, the command will return non-zero value.
